thread.title: BlackBerry Mercury passes through the Wi-Fi Alliance for certification
thread.title_full: BlackBerry Mercury passes through the Wi-Fi Alliance for certification

author: Bla1ze
title: BlackBerry Mercury passes through the Wi-Fi Alliance for certification
text:
At least one variation of the BlackBerry Mercury (BBB100-2) has now passed through the Wi-Fi Alliance for Wi-Fi certification.

Although it's slightly less interesting news considering we know we'll learn more at BlackBerry Mobile's Mercury launch event on February 25 , for those of you out there who like to check on where things are in the line of progress, at least one variation of the BlackBerry Mercury (BBB100-2) has now passed through the Wi-Fi Alliance for Wi-Fi certification.
Read More Â»
